com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference

Class DonationApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.DonationApplication
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationAdmin, ApplicationUser

    public abstract class DonationApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class contains information about donation application. If user want to donate, they will need to fill out the application first.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract long doApplication(android.content.Context context, ApplicationUser application)
      This is abstract method, child class will implement it differently User will be able to submit the application Admin will be able to review the application

      void setUserId(java.lang.String userId) 
      abstract java.util.List<ApplicationUser> viewApplication(android.content.Context context)
      This is abstract method, child class will implement it differently User will be able to see their own application Admin will show a list of applications all user submitted

      • DonationApplication

        public DonationApplication(java.lang.String userId,
                           java.lang.String donationTitle,
                           int govIssuedId,
                           java.lang.String donationDetail)
        Constructor initialize attributes
        Parameters:
        userId - userid associated with the user
        donationTitle - title of the donation user want to post
        govIssuedId - Ex: their driver's license
        donationDetail - the detailed information of the donation

      • doApplication

        public abstract long doApplication(android.content.Context context,
                                   ApplicationUser application)
        This is abstract method, child class will implement it differently User will be able to submit the application Admin will be able to review the application
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the Andriod activity used to call database
        application - The application user filled
        Returns:
        Return type of long, >0 indicate submit or review successful

      • viewApplication

        public abstract java.util.List<ApplicationUser> viewApplication(android.content.Context context)
        This is abstract method, child class will implement it differently User will be able to see their own application Admin will show a list of applications all user submitted
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the Andriod activity used to call database
        Returns:
        return type is a list of ApplicationUser
